info.title: Dev Academy
info.description:
Dev Academy is an online learning platform that offers technology courses.

contact:

message.default: User has been registered or Client error

get.description: Get all course available with simplified information and filter it if there is query params

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: filter to return certain course with newest (Paling Baru) or oldest (Promo) order

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category of course to return certain course

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: Level of course (Beginner), (Intermediate), and (Advanced) to return certain course

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: It will return certain course with name that contain the keyword

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: It will return certain course with same type (Premium or Free)

get.description: Get Chapter detail with their modules
Get all available chapters, if there is query params which is course id, return chapters that belong to that course

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: Id of course to return certain chapter

get.description: Get all the available modules, if there is a query params which is the chapter id, it will return the module that belongs to that chapter.

parameters.name: chapter_id
parameters.description: Id of chapter to return certain module

get.summary: Get user tracker with course by user
get.description: Get all Course by user id and their progress and filter it if there is query params

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: filter to return certain course with newest (Paling Baru) or oldest (Promo) order

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category of course to return certain course

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: Level of course (Beginner), (Intermediate), and (Advanced) to return certain course

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: It will return certain course with name that contain the keyword

parameters.name: progress
parameters.description: It will return certain course with same type (Selesai or In Progress)

200.description: Get all Course by user id and their progress success

put.description: Update user tracker by their id

get.description: Get user, course, and premium course data counts
Get all order by user with jwt

put.description: Update order status by their id
